description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science who are pursuing a degree in the Department of Biology. Eligibility Requirements? College of Mathematics and Science student Major in Biology Minimum GPA of 3.0

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: SIS_Major is Biology   or SIS_Major is Biology-Biomedical Sciences   or SIS_Major is Biology-Medical Laboratory Sci   or SIS_Major is Biology-Pre-Dental   or SIS_Major is Biology-Pre-Medical   or SIS_Major is Forensic Science-Molecular Bio   or SIS_Major is Forensic Sci-Molecular Biology   or SIS_Major is Science Ed-Biology   or SIS_Major is Biology-Pre-Optometry   or SIS_Major is Biology-Pre-Veterinary Med
